terrainCapabilities.name: DTED Level 0 ingestion
terrainCapabilities.description: Read DTED0 elevation tiles (121×121, ~900m resolution) for terrain analysis.

terrainCapabilities.name: DTED Level 1 ingestion
terrainCapabilities.description: Read DTED1 elevation tiles (1201×1201, ~90m resolution) for terrain analysis.

terrainCapabilities.name: DTED Level 2 ingestion
terrainCapabilities.description: Read DTED2 elevation tiles (3601×3601, ~30m resolution) for high-accuracy short-range terrain analysis.

terrainCapabilities.name: SRTM HGT ingestion
terrainCapabilities.description: Read SRTM HGT elevation files (1 arc-second, 3601×3601) as DTED2-equivalent data source.

terrainCapabilities.name: SRTM download (AWS)
terrainCapabilities.description: Download SRTM 1 arc-second tiles from public AWS Terrain Tiles (Skadi) bucket without authentication.

terrainCapabilities.name: Elevation cache
terrainCapabilities.description: Build and load binary .dtcache elevation cache for fast random-access terrain queries.

terrainCapabilities.name: Terrain elevation overlay
terrainCapabilities.description: Display colour-coded elevation map overlay on the scenario map with configurable boundary.

terrainCapabilities.name: Terrain mask computation
terrainCapabilities.description: Compute radial line-of-sight terrain masking from sensor positions with Earth curvature correction.

terrainCapabilities.name: Detection angle analysis
terrainCapabilities.description: Determine minimum detection elevation angles per azimuth sector based on terrain obstruction.

terrainCapabilities.name: Shapefile map underlay
terrainCapabilities.description: Display ESRI Shapefile (.shp) coastline and boundary polygons as map background.

terrainCapabilities.name: Bilinear elevation interpolation
terrainCapabilities.description: Interpolate terrain elevation at arbitrary lat/lon using bilinear sampling of cached grid.

terrainCapabilities.name: High-res on-demand query
terrainCapabilities.description: Query SRTM HGT files directly for high-resolution elevation without full cache rebuild.

toolCapabilities.name: HTML test report
toolCapabilities.description: Generate comprehensive HTML test evaluation reports with requirement traceability.

toolCapabilities.name: KML track export
toolCapabilities.description: Export UAS tracks and sensor coverage to KML/KMZ for Google Earth visualization.

toolCapabilities.name: UML diagram rendering
toolCapabilities.description: Render PlantUML diagrams (.puml) to PNG images for documentation and review.

toolCapabilities.name: Scenario map display
toolCapabilities.description: Interactive map with zoom/pan showing sensor sites, UAS trajectories, detection zones, and terrain.

toolCapabilities.name: Requirement traceability
toolCapabilities.description: Link test scenarios and evaluation metrics to CWA 18150 requirements for traceability analysis.

toolCapabilities.name: DTI pipeline simulation
toolCapabilities.description: Simulate Detection-Tracking-Identification pipeline with configurable system parameters.

sensorCapabilities.name: Sensor template library
sensorCapabilities.description: Pre-configured library of CUAS sensor templates (radar, EO/IR, RF, acoustic, lidar, multi-sensor).

sensorCapabilities.name: Sensor-specific Pd model
sensorCapabilities.description: Compute per-sensor probability of detection using range, RCS, weather, and sensor-specific performance curves.

sensorCapabilities.name: Radar sensor modelling
sensorCapabilities.description: Model pulse Doppler, FMCW, phased array, and compact surveillance radars with band-specific parameters.

sensorCapabilities.name: EO/IR sensor modelling
sensorCapabilities.description: Model daylight (VIS), MWIR cooled, LWIR uncooled, and multi-spectral EO/IR cameras.

sensorCapabilities.name: RF detector modelling
sensorCapabilities.description: Model wideband SDR, narrowband C2, and protocol analyser RF detectors.

sensorCapabilities.name: Acoustic sensor modelling
sensorCapabilities.description: Model microphone arrays and directional acoustic sensors for short-range UAS detection.

sensorCapabilities.name: Lidar sensor modelling
sensorCapabilities.description: Model scanning lidar for high-precision UAS detection and classification.

sensorCapabilities.name: Weather sensitivity model
sensorCapabilities.description: Per-sensor weather degradation factors for rain, fog, night, and snow conditions.

sensorCapabilities.name: Sensor selection UI
sensorCapabilities.description: Browse, inspect, and select CUAS sensors from template library for DTI configuration.

sensorCapabilities.name: Sensor specification display
sensorCapabilities.description: Display detailed sensor specifications including range, Pd, FAR, accuracy, weather factors.

sensorCapabilities.name: Quick sensor setup templates
sensorCapabilities.description: Pre-built sensor configurations: Basic (radar+EO/IR), Advanced (4-sensor), Full Spectrum (8-sensor).

multiDtiCapabilities.name: Multi-DTI node management
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Add, remove, and configure multiple DTI sensor nodes at different geographic positions.

multiDtiCapabilities.name: Detection fusion OR logic
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Fuse detections from multiple sensors using OR logic (any sensor detects = system detects).

multiDtiCapabilities.name: Detection fusion k-of-n voting
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Fuse detections requiring k-of-n sensor confirmations for balanced sensitivity and FAR.

multiDtiCapabilities.name: Detection fusion AND logic
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Fuse detections requiring all sensors to detect (minimum false alarm rate).

multiDtiCapabilities.name: Track fusion
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Select best tracking result per target across all DTI nodes based on continuity and accuracy.

multiDtiCapabilities.name: Identification fusion
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Consensus-based identification fusion selecting highest-confidence ID across nodes.

multiDtiCapabilities.name: System-of-systems evaluation
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Evaluate fused multi-DTI system as a unified system-of-systems with aggregate metrics.

multiDtiCapabilities.name: Coverage area computation
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Compute total sensor coverage area, estimated system Pd, and fused FAR across all nodes.

multiDtiCapabilities.name: False alarm reduction
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Multi-sensor false alarm reduction through cross-sensor confirmation.

multiDtiCapabilities.name: System resource metrics
multiDtiCapabilities.description: Compute total power consumption, weight, and deployment metrics for the sensor network.
